column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////If the food and coffee weren't great
column2: I'd probably be giving 2 stars for service.  Their organization could use some work.  They give you a number to take to your table
column3: but the staff go around asking people if what they're carrying is what they ordered.  It took quite some time for our food to come (for two)
column4: and the coffee even later.  The waiter was anxious to take away the number even though many parties were still waiting on items.  It was overall very disorganized - you could tell the staff was stressed.
